CustomField.formula: IF(NOT(ISBLANK(ParentId)), IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Parent.Global_Ultimate_Lookup__c)), HYPERLINK('/' + Parent.Global_Ultimate_Lookup__c, Parent.Global_Ultimate_Lookup__r.Name ) , HYPERLINK('/' + ParentId, Parent.Name )) , HYPERLINK('/' + Id, Name))
CustomField.label: Global Ultimate Enterprise
